subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Jurgen Klinsmann, the new coach of the U.S. men’s national soccer team, will discover there is no “American culture” in the sport. But Americans celebrate substance, as in winning.
snippet: Jurgen Klinsmann, the new coach of the U.S. men’s national soccer team, will discover there is no “American culture” in the sport. But Americans celebrate substance, as in winning.
